data.title: Marriage Certificates (Extracts) Occurred in Sri Lanka – High Commission of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka in the United Kingdom
data.text:
Application for obtaining certified Sri Lankan Births/Marriages/Death certificates (Extracts) should be made directly to the relevant Divisional Secretariat Office in Sri Lanka or:

Assistant Registrar General

Registrar General’s Department,

Central Record Room,

Maligawatta,

Colombo 10,

SRI LANKA

For More Information visit or contact department:

Website: http://www.rgd.gov.lk,

Tel: 00 94 11 288 9493 / 00 94 11 288 9488

Fax: 00 94 11 288 9491

Email: crr@sltnet.lk

Application forms can be obtained By visiting the following website links –

1. Birth Extract ;

2. Marriage Extract ;

3. Death Extract ;

Or from the Consular Division of this mission between 9.30 a.m. – 1.00 p.m.

Or By sending a Self-addressed, stamped envelope (9′ x 6′) with a request letter

IMPORTANT- All correspondences with regard to an application submitted to the Assistant Registrar General should be done directly with the Registrar Generals Department in Colombo.

If you wish to submit an application through this Mission, please submit the following documents;

Duly filled application along with a copy of the Certificate (if available)

Payment GBP 20/= in favour of “Sri Lanka High Commission” (Includes the postage)

The processing period to issue an extract of a certificate will depend on the location of the relevant Divisional Secretariat Office.

Obtaining a Birth/Marriage/Death certificate (Extract) occurred in the United Kingdom

Duly filled application form should be forwarded to this High Commission along with a copy of the certificate (if available)

PAYMENT – £20/- per copy (can be paid by Debit/Credit card or Postal Order in favour of “Sri Lanka High Commission”) *Other applicable charges will apply.

OTHER INFORMATION
